channel.title: PowerShell Scripting :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: Resources Windows PowerShell: Scripting Crash Course from Microsoft TechNet How to Write and Run Scripts in the Windows PowerShell ISE from Microsoft Windows PowerShell Scripting Tutorial for Beginners from Netwrix Video Transcript This video introduces the Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE) and covers the basics for creating and running your own scripts in Windows PowerShell. Before we begin, we must change one system setting to allow unsigned PowerShell scripts to run.
